GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
misc: ocxl: fix possible double free in ocxl_file_register_afu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit ee89d8dee55ab4b3b8ad8b70866b2841ba334767, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 75ca758adbafc81804c39b2c200ecdc819a6c042. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: ocxl: fix possible double free in ocxl_file_register_afu
